title: Localize UI to Bangla, switch currency to BDT with tap-to-earn conversion, and update ad system to remove delay + show ads from provided script/link

requirements.text: Localize the entire frontend UI to Bangla (bn-BD), including page titles, buttons, form labels/placeholders, toasts, alerts, empty states, and validation/error messages across Earn/Finance/E‑Service/Profile/Admin flows.

quotes: all app Language Bangla kore dao

acceptanceCriteria: All visible UI strings in the app are displayed in Bangla (bn-BD) by default.
No hard-coded English user-facing strings remain in core pages/components (excluding immutable UI library internals).
Tap-to-earn page text (e.g., headings, alerts, CTA labels, toast messages) is shown in Bangla.

requirements.text: Switch all money/balance displays and money input labels from USD to BDT across the app UI, using the ৳ symbol and Bangla locale formatting where appropriate.
acceptanceCriteria: Earnings dashboard balance and earnings cards display amounts as BDT (e.g., ৳123.45) instead of $-prefixed USD.
Withdraw page shows available balance in BDT and updates the amount label and helper text from USD to BDT.
Finance pages that accept/display amounts (e.g., Micro Loan, DPS) label and render amounts in BDT instead of USD.
No UI text references USD after the change (except in code comments/developer-only contexts).

requirements.text: Implement the tap-to-earn conversion rule: when the user claims tap-to-earn coins, each 1000 taps/coins adds 8 BDT to the user account balance, and any remainder taps/coins that do not make a full 1000 are preserved for future claiming.

quotes: Currency BDT 1000 tap korle 8 bdt balance a add korba

acceptanceCriteria: Backend claim operation credits account balance by +8 BDT for every full 1000 tap-to-earn coins available at claim time.
If the user has a remainder after conversion (e.g., 1500 coins), the claim credits only for full thousands (e.g., +8 BDT) and leaves the remainder (e.g., 500 coins) in tap-to-earn state.
Frontend claim confirmation/toast messaging reflects the credited BDT amount (not raw coin count).
Tap-to-earn page guidance text is updated to reflect the new rule (in Bangla).

requirements.text: Remove the previously implemented 30-second delay from the Tap-to-Earn ad triggering flow so that when an ad threshold is reached, the interstitial ad shows immediately (no countdown/pending state).

quotes: Ad system ta ami pore jei 30 second delay add korchilam seta kete diyo

acceptanceCriteria: When an ad threshold is reached on Tap-to-Earn, the ad interstitial opens immediately without waiting 30 seconds.
The countdown UI and any 'scheduled in N seconds' messaging no longer appears.
No setInterval/setTimeout-based 30-second countdown behavior remains in the tap-to-earn ad scheduler.

requirements.text: Update the Tap-to-Earn ad interstitial to load and display ads from the user-provided ad script and direct ad link (external), replacing the current self-hosted static ad creative inventory for ad content rendering.

quotes: script and ads direct link dichi seta theke ads show korbe

acceptanceCriteria: The ad interstitial supports rendering an externally provided ad via a configurable script snippet and/or a direct ad URL.

The existing self-hosted creative inventory selection (imagePath/title/description) is no longer the source of truth for what is displayed in the interstitial once external ad configuration is present.
If the external ad script/link fails to load, the interstitial shows a user-friendly Bangla error state and allows the user to close and continue.
The ad configuration values (script and direct link) are stored in a single explicit configuration location in the frontend codebase so they can be updated without refactoring multiple components.

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui (read-only UI library sources). Compose them instead.
Do not edit immutable auth/actor bootstrap hooks: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx.
Backend must remain a single Motoko actor with all logic in backend/main.mo; only add backend/migration.mo if an actual state migration is required.
nonGoals: Adding third-party authentication providers (only Internet Identity is supported).
Adding real-time networking features (e.g., WebSockets) for ads or earnings.
Introducing external databases or backend services outside the existing Motoko canister.
